CXFEL Documentation Home Page

Introduction

This section provides documentation specific to the CXFEL project. It covers various aspects of the project including setup, usage, and troubleshooting. This documentation is designed to be a comprehensive guide for users and developers working with CXFEL.

This documentation is still under construction and will be updated regularly to reflect the latest changes and features.

Contents

    • Research Areas
    • Facilities and Equipment
    • Collaboration Opportunities
    • Contact Information

Installation

Provide instructions on how to use CXFEL, including common workflows, commands, or tasks that users can perform.

Troubleshooting

Offer solutions to common problems or issues that users might encounter while working with CXFEL.
